meaningMnemonic: Super <radical>poop</radical> is a super <radical>power</radical> you have in <kanji>infancy</kanji>. Those in infancy have the power to poop at will, whenever and wherever they please. Infancy poop power!
readingMnemonic: In <kanji>infancy</kanji>, one eats a lot of soft foods, such as <reading>yo</reading>gurt (よう). Yogurt is the food item above all others that grants superior pooping power.
